query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		trayescalation {
			_id,
			created_at,
			id,
			reference,
			solution_instance {
				_id,
				created,
				description,
				edit_url,
				enabled,
				id,
				linkable,
				name,
				solution {
					_id,
					custom_fields,
					description,
					id,
					name,
					test_button_enabled,
					title,
					url,
				},
				url,
			},
			url,
		}
	}
